title: Personality Preferences Survey
description: Please rate how much you agree or disagree with each statement based on your typical preferences and behaviors. There are 40 questions.

elements.name: NPI_01
elements.title: People often turn to me for guidance in tough situations.

elements.name: NPI_02
elements.title: I often feel unsure about how to guide others.

elements.name: NPI_03
elements.title: I enjoy sharing my experiences when others are interested.

elements.name: NPI_04
elements.title: I'd rather keep a low profile in group settings.

elements.name: NPI_05
elements.title: I tend to naturally take charge in group projects.

elements.name: NPI_06
elements.title: I'm hesitant to step into leadership roles.

elements.name: NPI_07
elements.title: I feel confident directing others when needed.

elements.name: NPI_08
elements.title: I usually speak up when I have something to say.

elements.name: NPI_09
elements.title: I often hold back from expressing my opinions.

elements.name: NPI_10
elements.title: I prefer being the one making decisions in a group.

elements.name: NPI_11
elements.title: I'm fine letting others take the lead.

elements.name: NPI_12
elements.title: I can usually convince people to see things my way.

elements.name: NPI_13
elements.title: I avoid trying to sway others' opinions.

elements.name: NPI_14
elements.title: I expect others to acknowledge my contributions.

elements.name: NPI_15
elements.title: I feel I'm usually appreciated for what I do.

elements.name: NPI_16
elements.title: I don't put much effort into my appearance.

elements.name: NPI_17
elements.title: I enjoy putting thought into how I present myself.

elements.name: NPI_18
elements.title: I like checking how I look throughout the day.

elements.name: NPI_19
elements.title: I rarely think about my appearance.

elements.name: NPI_20
elements.title: I appreciate when people notice my efforts.

elements.name: NPI_21
elements.title: Recognition from others isn't that important to me.

elements.name: NPI_22
elements.title: I believe others should go out of their way to help me.

elements.name: NPI_23
elements.title: I enjoy supporting others without expecting much in return.

elements.name: NPI_24
elements.title: I feel I should get more than what I currently receive.

elements.name: NPI_25
elements.title: I'm generally content with what I have.

elements.name: NPI_26
elements.title: I like it when people look up to me.

elements.name: NPI_27
elements.title: I don't need others' admiration to feel good.

elements.name: NPI_28
elements.title: I enjoy showcasing my strengths when I can.

elements.name: NPI_29
elements.title: I prefer not to draw attention to my abilities.

elements.name: NPI_30
elements.title: I'm confident in handling most tasks on my own.

elements.name: NPI_31
elements.title: I often doubt my ability to manage things alone.

elements.name: NPI_32
elements.title: I tend to rely on others to get things done.

elements.name: NPI_33
elements.title: I prefer figuring things out independently.

elements.name: NPI_34
elements.title: People enjoy hearing about my experiences.

elements.name: NPI_35
elements.title: I don't think my stories stand out to others.

elements.name: NPI_36
elements.title: I feel I have unique qualities that set me apart.

elements.name: NPI_37
elements.title: I see myself as fairly typical compared to others.

elements.name: NPI_38
elements.title: It bothers me when I go unnoticed in a group.

elements.name: NPI_39
elements.title: I'm okay with not being the focus of attention.

elements.name: NPI_40
elements.title: Having influence over others isn't a priority for me.
